Returns: this builder This value will never be null.
Parameters: Bundle: This value may be null.

Returns: This value will never be null.
build().Description: Builds and returns the request object.

Parameters: LocaleList: ordered list of locale preferences that may be used to disambiguate the provided text. If no locale preferences exist, set this to null or an empty locale list. This value may be null.
CharSequence: text providing context for the selected text (which is specified by the sub sequence starting at selectionStartIndex and ending at selectionEndIndex) This value must never be null.
int: start index of the selected part of text Value is 0 or greater
int: end index of the selected part of text Value is 0 or greater
TextSelection.Request.Builder(java.lang..FullName: public TextSelection.Request.Builder (CharSequence text, int startIndex, int endIndex)

ClassDesc: A builder for building TextSelection requests.
